title: Enhancing Healthcare Practice Competencies: Applying the CAFE Model for Distance Education Design: Science Domain

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: One can explain the four elements of the CAFE model: content, activities, facilitation, and evaluation.
One can apply the CAFE model to design remote science instruction.
One can design and implement project-based assessments in large-scale online learning environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
